Topic.Title: Why F12 instead of the up arrow...

Posts.EditableText: ... for repeating the previous command? Every other text adventure system I play games with uses the up arrow to repeat the previous command, yet Quest uses F12. Why? It makes playing a Quest game a pain after playing a game with any other system.
